description:
pkg/runtime: 2 sanity checks in the runtime-gdb.py prettyprinters.

Don't try to print obviously corrupt slices or interfaces.
Doesn't actually solve 3047 or 2818, but seems a good idea anyway.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM but read the diffs yourself

There are some inappropriate mid-line tabs.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5708061/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py
File src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5708061/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py#newcode8
src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py:8: section in the compiled binary.	 The [68]l linkers emit this with a
On 2012/02/29 15:33:19, bsiegert wrote:
> What happened here?

emacs tabify.

undone.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=64a406cd2578 ***

pkg/runtime: 2 sanity checks in the runtime-gdb.py prettyprinters.

Don't try to print obviously corrupt slices or interfaces.
Doesn't actually solve 3047 or 2818, but seems a good idea anyway.

R=rsc, bsiegert
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5708061

Just a nitpick.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5708061/diff/1002/src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py

What happened here?
i think i got them all, sorry for that.
